src:
Sesi I
IHSG Parkir di Zona Hijau ke 6.218
05 Nov 2019, 05:19 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Ilustrasi/Foto: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) parkir di zona positif siang ini. IHSG parkir di 6.218 dengan penguatan 38 poin (0,62%).Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.005. Dolar AS cenderung melemah dibandingkan posisi pagi tadi.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 24 poin (0,39%) ke 6.204. Indeks LQ45 naik 5,8 poin (0,60%) ke 982.Membuka perdagangan Selasa (5/11/2019), IHSG terus naik 28 poin (0,49%) ke level 6.210. Indeks LQ45 naik 6 poin (0,62%) poin ke 981.Jeda siang, IHSG parkir di 6.218 dengan penguatan 38 poin (0,62%). Indeks LQ45 naik 10 poin (1,07%) ke 986.Mengutip Artha Sekuritas, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Menguat. Dow Jones ditutup 27.462,11 (+0,42%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.433,20 (+0,56%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.078,27 (+0,37%). Bursa AS ditutup menguat setelah adanya kejelasan dari potensi tanda tangan perjanjian dagang antara AS-China.Hal tersebut dilontarkan oleh sekretaris perdagangan AS Wilbur Ross yang akan memberikan lisensi kepada Huawei untuk menjual di AS dalam waktu dekat. Ini memberikan kepercayaan pada investor bahwa ekonomi global akan lebih stabil bila perang dagang AS-China mulai terlihat jalan keluarnya. Selain itu hasil dari laporan keuangan 9M19 di AS secara umum lebih baik dari ekspektasi investor juga memberikan dorongan menguat bagi bursa saham.Bursa Asia siang ini bergerak di zona hijau, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 naik 444 poin ke 23.295
Indeks Hang Seng bertambah 169 poin ke 27.715
Indeks Shanghai naik 29 poin ke 3.004
Indeks Strait Times menguat 15 poin ke 3.252


Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "

text:
Session I
JCI Parking in the Green Zone to 6,218
05 Nov 2019, 05:19 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Illustration / Photo: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) parked in the positive zone this afternoon. JCI parked at 6,218 with a strengthening of 38 points (0.62%). The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning was at the level of Rp 14,005. The US dollar tends to weaken compared to the position this morning. In pre-trade, CSPI rose 24 points (0.39%) to 6,204. The LQ45 index rose 5.8 points (0.60%) to 982. Opening trading on Tuesday (11/05/2019), the JCI continued to rise 28 points (0.49%) to 6,210. The LQ45 index rose 6 points (0.62%) points to 981. In the afternoon break, the JCI parked at 6,218 with a gain of 38 points (0.62%). The LQ45 index rose 10 points (1.07%) to 986. Quoting Artha Sekuritas, the United States (US) exchange closed stronger. The Dow Jones closed 27,462.11 (+ 0.42%), NASDAQ closed 8,433.20 (+ 0.56%), the S&P 500 closed 3,078.27 (+ 0.37%). US markets closed higher after clarity on the potential for a US-China trade agreement. The issue was made by US trade secretary Wilbur Ross, who will grant Huawei a license to sell in the US in the near future. This gives investors confidence that the global economy will be more stable if the US-China trade war begins to appear. In addition, the results of the 9M19 financial statements in the US were generally better than investors' expectations and also provided a stronger boost for the stock market. Asian Stock Exchange this afternoon moved in the green zone, following its movements:

The Nikkei 225 index rose 444 points to 23,295
The Hang Seng Index added 169 points to 27,715
The Shanghai index rose 29 points to 3,004
The Strait Times Index rose 15 points to 3,252


Check out the video "Dollar Penetrates Rp. 14,200"
